hero.subtitle: TECHNOLOGICAL
hero.description: Innovation and cutting-edge technology in every production process

items.title: CNC Technology or Router
items.description: Our Computer Numerical Control (CNC) system represents the forefront of industrial precision. This technology enables cuts, drilling, milling, and other processes with millimetric accuracy and perfect repeatability. The automated system guarantees efficient, consistent production with minimal margin of error, optimizing both manufacturing times and material utilization. Digital programming allows for complex and customized designs while maintaining the highest quality standards.

items.title: Scanner
items.description: Advanced scanning technology that precisely visualizes the wood interior, identifying imperfections, knots, cracks, and hidden defects. This system enables optimal material selection before processing, eliminating defects and maximizing raw material utilization. The scanner detects internal characteristics invisible to the naked eye, ensuring only the highest quality wood reaches subsequent production stages, reducing waste and guaranteeing superior final products.

items.title: Double Squaring Machine
items.description: High-precision specialized machine designed to make perfectly squared and consistent cuts in our wood pieces. With dual cutting heads, this equipment guarantees perpendicular edges and exact dimensions in every processed piece. The squaring machine ensures all pieces maintain perfect 90-degree angles and consistent measurements, fundamental for subsequent assembly and structural quality of our products. Its precision eliminates variations and guarantees professional finishing in every cut.

items.title: Automated and Ecological Painting
items.description: Automated painting system using water-based inks, sealers, and lacquers, representing our commitment to sustainability and health. This ecological process eliminates toxic solvent use, significantly reducing volatile organic compound (VOC) emissions. The technology combines uniform automated application with UV and infrared curing systems, achieving durable, resistant, high-quality finishes. The process improves worker safety, reduces environmental impact, and produces superior finishes with excellent adhesion and protection.

paintTechnology.title: TECHNOLOGICAL PROCESSES
paintTechnology.subtitle: Paints based on water-based inks, sealers, and lacquers:

benefits.title: Greater health safety
benefits.description: By containing low or no toxic solvents, they reduce workers' exposure to hazardous compounds and decrease health risks.

benefits.title: Reduced environmental impact
benefits.description: These products have low levels of Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs), contributing to reduced air pollution and carbon footprint.

benefits.title: Lower flammability risk
benefits.description: Unlike solvent-based products, water-based formulations are non-flammable, improving safety in production facilities.

benefits.title: Durability and resistance
benefits.description: When combined with proper drying processes (such as UV and IR lamps), these products offer excellent resistance to wear, discoloration, and environmental factors.

benefits.title: Better process performance
benefits.description: They have good adhesion, stability, and finish quality, improving the product's final appearance and optimizing production times.

benefits.title: Simpler waste treatment
benefits.description: By not generating hazardous waste, it can be treated directly on-site, reducing costs and improving process sustainability.

quality.title: GREATER RESISTANCE AND PROTECTION
quality.description: Wood products incorporating water-based inks, sealers, and lacquers can achieve greater resistance and protection.
features: Resistance to discoloration: Water-based lacquers and inks, combined with UV curing, offer greater stability against light and UV rays, preventing color deterioration over time.
Protection against moisture and stains: Water-based sealers form a protective layer that reduces moisture absorption and facilitates surface cleaning, protecting it from liquids and dirt.
Greater mechanical durability: Thermal curing (with hot air or IR lamps) and final UV light curing hardens the applied layer, providing greater resistance to scratching, wear, and daily abrasion.
Finish stability: These formulations have good adhesion and flexibility, preventing the finish from cracking or peeling with temperature or humidity changes.
